document.full_text: the philadelphia flyers fought off the buffalo sabres in a thrilling 5-4 overtime win to force a game seven in their first-round playoff series on sunday.
document.title: flyers force game seven against sabres with ot triumph
lines_and_colors: the philadelphia flyers fought off the buffalo sabres in a thrilling 5-4 overtime win to force a game seven in their first-round playoff series on sunday.
